name: part_002
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ生誕祭】ポルカプロデュース!最強アイドルグループ3DLIVE! [ywvR52V7HiI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of '徒花ネクロマンシー' (Adabana Necromancy).
Polka's MC and transition to the next performance.

subtitles.original: 牙を剥け
subtitles.english: Bare your fangs

subtitles.original: いつか誰もが散華する捨て石
subtitles.english: Someday everyone will fall like scattered petals, like sacrificial stones

subtitles.original: 輝け　刹那無限の火花
subtitles.english: Shine, the infinite sparks of a moment

subtitles.original: 乱世に迸る
subtitles.english: Gushing out into the turbulent world

subtitles.original: SAGA! SAGA!
subtitles.english: SAGA! SAGA!

subtitles.original: 何が神の冒涜か
subtitles.english: What is blasphemy against God?

subtitles.original: 裁きなどさせない
subtitles.english: I won't let you judge me

subtitles.original: 希望　高らかに打ち鳴らせ
subtitles.english: Let hope ring out loudly

subtitles.original: 呼吸よりも生きた証
subtitles.english: A proof of life more than breath itself

subtitles.original: 徒花
subtitles.english: Idle flower

subtitles.original: まだまだ朽ち果てても進め
subtitles.english: Go forward even if you rot away

subtitles.original: 奪わせはしない
subtitles.english: I won't let you take it

subtitles.original: 尊厳の愚弄に
subtitles.english: To the mockery of dignity

subtitles.original: 飢餓を解き放て
subtitles.english: Unleash the hunger

subtitles.original: 枯れても走る
subtitles.english: Run even if withered

subtitles.original: ことを命と呼べ
subtitles.english: Call it 'life'

subtitles.original: 空に叫ぶ　生存の定義
subtitles.english: Shout the definition of survival to the sky

subtitles.original: 骨を斬らせて
subtitles.english: Let them cut my bones

subtitles.original: 闇を断って
subtitles.english: Sever the darkness

subtitles.original: 雲間に光る
subtitles.english: Shining through the clouds

subtitles.original: 簒奪の勝機
subtitles.english: A chance for usurpation victory

subtitles.original: 覚悟を宿命に突きつけて
subtitles.english: Thrust your resolve into fate

subtitles.original: 荒野を駆ける
subtitles.english: Running through the wasteland

subtitles.original: 乱世に挑む
subtitles.english: Challenging the turbulent world

subtitles.original: 天下に狂い咲く
subtitles.english: Blooming out of season under the heavens

subtitles.original: SAGA! SAGA!
subtitles.english: SAGA! SAGA!

subtitles.original: よし！一曲目みんなでアダル... 徒花ネクロマンシー！
subtitles.english: Alright! The first song with everyone was Adal... Adabana Necromancy!

subtitles.original: なんとなく、うまくいった気がする！
subtitles.english: I feel like it went well somehow!

subtitles.original: あの、下からのジャンプね。めっちゃよかったよ。ありがとう、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Um, that jump from below. It was really great. Thank you, thank you!

subtitles.original: よし、気合改め。行ってらっしゃーい！
subtitles.english: Alright, renewing my spirit. Here I go!

subtitles.original:
Pretty fever
作詞 / 作曲 : 田淵 智也
subtitles.english:
Pretty fever
Lyrics / Composition: Tomoya Tabuchi

subtitles.original: 不意にクエスチョンマークが絡みつくわけ
subtitles.english: The reason why question marks suddenly entangle me

subtitles.original: けどセルフィッシュさえも踊り出すわ
subtitles.english: But even selfishness starts to dance

subtitles.original: 心天秤のご機嫌どうでしょう
subtitles.english: How is the mood of my heart's scale?

subtitles.original: ねえ
subtitles.english: Hey

subtitles.original: 瞬間じゃ決まらない思考回路
subtitles.english: Thought processes that can't be decided in an instant

subtitles.original: 右左　不安回路
subtitles.english: Left, right, anxiety circuits

subtitles.original: A to Zに隙はない
subtitles.english: There are no gaps from A to Z

subtitles.original: 至って　至って　選定EASY?
subtitles.english: Completely, completely, is the selection EASY?

subtitles.original: 軽く言わないでよね
subtitles.english: Don't say it so lightly

subtitles.original: 僕は僕は都合もあるから
subtitles.english: Because I have my own circumstances too

subtitles.original: とは言ってもそろそろOK
subtitles.english: Having said that, it's almost OK

subtitles.original: あのね　I like me
subtitles.english: You know, I like me

subtitles.original: は確定　意地っ子でも
subtitles.english: is certain, even if I'm a stubborn child

subtitles.original: I know meは言い切れない
subtitles.english: I can't say for sure 'I know me'

subtitles.original: ためらっても論より証拠
subtitles.english: Even if I hesitate, proof is better than theory

subtitles.original: 悩んだ時間は自信に変換して
subtitles.english: Convert the time spent worrying into confidence

subtitles.original: 耐えないで回ってく世界のいたずら
subtitles.english: The world's pranks that keep spinning without ceasing

subtitles.original: パラレルみたいに浮かんでくるひとりごと
subtitles.english: Soliloquies that float up like parallel lines

subtitles.original: 僕がいつかそうだ　大人になるまで
subtitles.english: Until I eventually, that's right, become an adult

subtitles.original: 交わらなくたっていいでしょう
subtitles.english: It's fine if we don't cross paths, right?

subtitles.original: ほら一歩踏み出すタイミング狙い撃ち
subtitles.english: Look, sniping the timing to take a step forward

subtitles.original: 願いを起動する呪文が必要なんです
subtitles.english: I need a spell to activate my wishes

subtitles.original: I want to changeぐらい言っちゃおうかな
subtitles.english: Maybe I'll go ahead and say 'I want to change'

subtitles.original: Yeah
subtitles.english: Yeah

subtitles.original: 飽きてる暇もないほど
subtitles.english: To the point where there's no time to get bored

subtitles.original: Yeah
subtitles.english: Yeah

subtitles.original: 奏でるよ　Pretty fever
subtitles.english: I'll play it, Pretty fever

subtitles.original: I think so... ねえ
subtitles.english: I think so... hey

subtitles.original: このままじゃ完成度　上げられぬまま
subtitles.english: If things stay like this, without being able to increase the quality

subtitles.original: Time goes on
subtitles.english: Time goes on

subtitles.original: そう　幻じゃないでしょう
subtitles.english: Yes, it's not an illusion, is it?

subtitles.original: わがまま　周りが認めてるプロフィール
subtitles.english: Selfishness, a profile recognized by those around me

subtitles.original: と目指す未来図の純粋度
subtitles.english: And the purity of the future map I aim for

subtitles.original: 足して二で割って　そんぐらいは見逃して
subtitles.english: Add them and divide by two, please overlook at least that much

subtitles.original: クエスチョンマークが絡みつくわ
subtitles.english: Question marks are entangling me

subtitles.original: けどセルフィッシュさえも踊り出すわ
subtitles.english: But even selfishness starts to dance

subtitles.original: 心天秤の裁きは決まってる
subtitles.english: The judgment of my heart's scale is already decided

subtitles.original: もう
subtitles.english: Already

subtitles.original: 不器用に回ってる世界も好きだよ
subtitles.english: I love this clumsily spinning world too

subtitles.original: それでも器用に浮かんでくるひとりごと
subtitles.english: Still, soliloquies that float up skillfully

subtitles.original: 困らせちゃうソーリー
subtitles.english: Sorry for troubling you

subtitles.original: でもでもずっとずっとシークレット
subtitles.english: But but, it's a secret forever and ever

subtitles.original: 知ってなんていらない決まりです
subtitles.english: It's a rule that I don't need you to know

subtitles.original: 驚かせちゃうほど大きい声で
subtitles.english: With a voice loud enough to surprise you

subtitles.original: Pretty fever
subtitles.english: Pretty fever

subtitles.original: 予想を上回って裏切っちゃって
subtitles.english: Exceeding expectations and betraying them

subtitles.original: 覚悟はいいですか
subtitles.english: Are you ready?

subtitles.original: I like me
subtitles.english: I like me

subtitles.original: 絶対譲れないから
subtitles.english: Because I absolutely won't back down
